documentation.text:
transfer profits to staking pool to be ditributed to stakers.
 @dev transfer profits since last compound to the staking pool while taking out necessary fees.

documentation.text:
initates authorization timelock for adding live wallet address
 @dev sets the timelock variable to current time. after 24 hours a window of 1 hour will be open for using the associated setter

initates authorization timelock for updating reserve address
 @dev sets the timelock variable to current time. after 24 hours a window of 1 hour will be open for using the associated setter

initates authorization timelock for updating lottery address
 @dev sets the timelock variable to current time. after 24 hours a window of 1 hour will be open for using the associated setter

 @dev transfer profits since last compound to the staking pool while taking out necessary fees.

attributes.text:
initates authorization timelock for adding live wallet address
 @dev sets the timelock variable to current time. after 24 hours a window of 1 hour will be open for using the associated setter

initates authorization timelock for updating reserve address
 @dev sets the timelock variable to current time. after 24 hours a window of 1 hour will be open for using the associated setter

initates authorization timelock for updating lottery address
 @dev sets the timelock variable to current time. after 24 hours a window of 1 hour will be open for using the associated setter

addUserLoss(uint256).details: adds funds to the bankroll if bankroll is in positive, otherwise its transfered to the staking pool to recover frozen funds

authorizeAddress(address).details: updates the authorizedAddresses mapping to true for given address

initiateAuthorizationTimelock().details: sets the timelock variable to current time. after 24 hours a window of 1 hour will be open for using the associated setter

initiateLotteryTimelock().details: sets the timelock variable to current time. after 24 hours a window of 1 hour will be open for using the associated setter

initiateReserveTimelock().details: sets the timelock variable to current time. after 24 hours a window of 1 hour will be open for using the associated setter

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

payOutUserWinning(uint256,address).details: deducts funds from the bankroll if bankroll is in positive, otherwise theyre pulled from staking pool and bankroll marked as negative

removeAuthorization(address).details: updates the authorizedAddresses mapping by deleting entry for given address

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setLotteryAddress(address).details: changes the address which recieves lottery fees

setProfitThreshold(uint256).details: stores the _threshold address in the state variable `profitThreshold`

setReserveAddress(address).details: changes the address which recieves reserve fees

setShares(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint25.details: stores the _houseBankrollShare address in the state variable `houseBankrollShare`

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

transferProfit().details: transfer profits since last compound to the staking pool while taking out necessary fees.

addUserLoss(uint256).notice: Add users loss to the bankroll

authorizeAddress(address).notice: authorize address to register wins and losses

initiateAuthorizationTimelock().notice: initates authorization timelock for adding live wallet address

initiateLotteryTimelock().notice: initates authorization timelock for updating lottery address

initiateReserveTimelock().notice: initates authorization timelock for updating reserve address

payOutUserWinning(uint256,address).notice: Deduct users win from the bankroll

removeAuthorization(address).notice: remove authorization of an address from register wins and losses

setLotteryAddress(address).notice: store new address in lottery address

setReserveAddress(address).notice: store new address in reserve address

transferProfit().notice: transfer profits to staking pool to be ditributed to stakers.
